28. Robin Lakoff (1968:170) and McCawley (1976b [1967]:84) both credit Ross with the proposal, and it was one of the highlights of the elaborate Floyd talks he gave on the early lecture circuit. In addition to Lakoff and McCawley, Boyd and Thorne (1969) and Sadock (1969) also beat Ross to print with underlying performative treatments of illocutionary force. Sadock’s work was clearly inspired by Ross, but Boyd and Thome’s proposal appears to have been an independent development. Their notes acknowledge the comments of Ross on earlier versions of their proposal, but don’t indicate any influence beyond useful criticism. In any case, Ross does not mention their work in his paper and it had virtually no impact on the performative debates, which is unfortunate because it is in some ways more subtle, cutting finer semantic distinctions. The paper, published in England, appears to have been a casualty of American chauvinism.

29.罗斯只说，底层抽象动词“像say ”（1970b [1968]:238），并且它与某些句法特征有关，如 [+ 施行性] 和 [+ 陈述性]。由于将抽象动词表示为SAY或DECLARE并不重要，正如他的论证的大多数表述一样，我选择了更一致的TELL。罗斯（1975:249n19）采用了这一惯例。

29. Ross says only that the underlying abstract verb is “like say” (1970b [1968]:238), and that it is associated with certain syntactic features, like [+performative] and [+declarative]. Since nothing of consequence hangs on representing the abstract verb as SAY or DECLARE, as most representations of his argument do, I have opted for the more congruous TELL. Ross (1975:249n19) adopts this convention.

30.请注意，除了面对正常的论证问题之外，罗斯对陈述句的具体建议也并非是言外之力的引入所必需。也就是说，人们可以很容易地拥有一种语法，用隐性施事动词来编码言外之力，而不需要这样的动词来表达陈述句。事实上，奥斯汀的许多著作都强调了施事动词（不包含施事动词）之间的区别。陈述句（有真值）和表述句（有真值）的区分表明，对陈述句（表述句）进行编码的最合适机制是没有施事动词。此外，就转换语法发展出句子类型学而言，它完全遵循了这种格式（陈述句是没有底层 Q 或 I 的句子）。也就是说，罗斯选择了施事分析中最困难的方面来辩护。

30. Notice then, that, in addition to facing the normal problems of justification, Ross’s specific proposal for declarative sentences is also not required by the incorporation of illocutionary force. That is, one could easily have a grammar that codes illocutionary force in terms of covert performative verbs and still not need such a verb for declaratives. Indeed, much of Austin’s work, where he enforces a distinction between performatives (which do not have truth values) and constatives (which do have truth values) suggests that the most appropriate mechanism for coding declaratives (constatives) is the absence of performative verb. Moreover, to the extent that transformational grammar had developed a typopology of sentences, it had followed exactly this format (declaratives were those sentences without an underlying Q or I). That is, Ross chose the most difficult aspect of the performative analysis to defend.

31.按照 Ross (1975b:71) 的说法，谓词提升最初是作为 Lakoff 的变换 Plugging-in 而出现的；据推测这是来自一篇未发表的著作，该著作概括了起始变换和因果变换。

31. According to Ross (1975b:71), Predicate-raising began life as Lakoff’s transformation, Plugging-in; presumably this is from unpublished work which generalized Inchoative and Causative transformations.

32.同样地，当然，其他词汇插入规则（例如下面的规则）也是该包的隐含部分：

32. Similarly, of course, other lexical insertion rules, like the following, were implicitly part of the package:

33 . 在某些方面，生成语义学的提出比 Lakoff 和 Ross 的论文更准确，因为它是该框架中第一个令人信服的积极提议。尽管已经过去了十年，但 Vroman (1976:38) 的以下赞颂捕捉到了人们对 McCawley 提议的欢迎：

33. In some ways, generative semantics dates more accurately from this paper than from Lakoff and Ross’s, since it is the first compelling positive proposal in the framework. Although it is a decade after the fact, the following paean from Vroman (1976:38) captures the reception that greeted McCawley’s proposal:

McCawley 的预词汇分析与先前的句法研究相吻合，但更受限制，因为它减少了假设的数量（实质性普遍性，如选择特征、语义解释规则等）；即简单性标准，并自动扩展了可以解释的数据集：单词的可能含义、副词范围歧义、指称/非指称歧义等，即普遍性标准。他的模型将句法理论与语义理论统一起来，并正式指出，控制句子形式分布的规则就是控制单词含义分布的规则。

McCawley’s pre-lexical analysis fits in with prior work in syntax, is more constrained in that it reduces the number of assumptions (substa[n]tive universals like selectional features, semantic interpretation rules, and the like); i.e., criterion of simplicity, and automatically expands the set of data that can be accounted for: possible meanings of words, adverbial scope ambiguities, referential/non-referential ambiguities, etc., i.e., criterion of generality. His model unifies a theory of syntax with one of semantics and formally says the rules which govern the distribution of forms in sentences are those which govern the distributions of meanings in words.

34.另请参阅李氏同一时期的另一篇论文，他在其中提供的证据表明“表达式的最深层句法结构本身或多或少是其语义描述的直接图景！”（1970b[1967]：185）。

34. See also another Lees paper from the same period, where he offers evidence that “the deepest syntactic structure of expressions is itself a more or less direct picture of their semantic descriptions!” (1970b [1967]:185).

第六章

Chapter 6

1.博林格在这里的评论来自两个来源；一些来自写给我的信，一些来自他的“第一人称，非单数”回忆录（1991[1974]：29）。

1. Bolinger’s comments here are spliced from two sources; some come from letters to me, and some from his “First Person, Not Singular” memoir (1991 [1974]:29).

Newmeyer (1980a:93, 1986a:82) 表示，Lakoff-Ross 研讨会“致力于挑战当时受 Chomsky 青睐的分析”，Lakoff 和 Ross 都否认这一点。两种解释都有其道理。一些参与者回忆起对 Chomsky 的敌意，另一些人则回忆起对 Chomsky 的崇敬；这两种态度并不排斥，而且可能同样有代表性。事实上，即使在战争后期，生成语义学论文也可以引用句法结构或类似经文的方面，并相当简短地驳斥 Chomsky 的当代作品。

Newmeyer (1980a:93, 1986a:82) says that the Lakoff-Ross seminars were “devoted to challenging analyses then favored by Chomsky,” which both Lakoff and Ross deny. There is substance for both interpretations. Some participants recall antagonism toward Chomsky, others recall reverence; the two attitudes are not exclusive and were probably equally well represented. Indeed, even relatively late in the wars, generative semantics papers could cite Syntactic Structures or Aspects like scripture and dismiss Chomsky’s contemporary work rather curtly.

2.乔姆斯基休假时间为 1966 年秋季学期。1967 年春季学期，他回来教授两门课程，“英语结构 I”和“知识分子与社会变革”。这些讲座（“评论”讲座）于 1967 年秋季举行。

2. Chomsky’s leave was for the fall term of 1966. He returned to teach two courses in the spring term of 1967, “Structure of English I” and “Intellectuals and Social Change.” These lectures (the “Remarks” lectures) took place in fall 1967.

3. Jackendoff 更为人熟知的版本是“变换不执行派生形态学”（1972：12-13），意思几乎相同。

3. Jackendoff’s better-known version is “transformations do not perform derivational morphology” (1972:12–13), which means pretty much the same thing.

4.正如我们将看到的，他有些含糊地表达了怀疑，但词汇学假说的一个 Katz-Postal 后果应该是显而易见的，即短语 (i) 的深层结构 (子树) 将不再与句子 (ii) 背后的深层结构相同。

4. He voiced the suspicions somewhat vaguely, as we will see, but one Katz-Postal consequence of the lexicalist hypothesis should be immediately apparent, namely that the deep structure (subtree) of phrase (i) would no longer be the same as the deep structure underlying sentence (ii).

（i）乔姆斯基拒绝生成语义学。

(i) Chomsky’s refusal of generative semantics.

（ii）乔姆斯基拒绝生成语义学。

(ii) Chomsky refused generative semantics.

由于 (ii) 是 (i) 含义中相当关键的组成部分，因此从不同的深层结构中推导出它们直接违背了 Katz-Postal 原则（以及支配抽象语法的相应启发式方法）的精神。

Since (ii) is a rather crucial component of the meaning of (i), deriving them both from different deep structures swam directly against the spirit of the Katz-Postal principle (and the corresponding heuristic that governed abstract syntax).

5.例如，乔姆斯基和哈勒认为类比法的运用“有效性值得怀疑”（1968:356n12；很难确定这本书的“实际”日期，而不是出版日期。这本书的写作时间长达近十年，1959 年首次被引用为“即将出版”，六十年代的生成性著作经常引用它；拉科夫 1965 年的论文采用了其中一项建议）。在《笛卡尔语言学》一书中，乔姆斯基将布卢姆菲尔德和霍克特对类比法的引用作为他们误入歧途的症状（1966a:12，81 n21，82n22）。除了“评论”的昙花一现之外，他对类比的立场也没有任何明显改变：“类比似乎是一个无用的概念，它仅仅被用来表达对实际操作过程和原则的无知”（1988a:24）。Ikeuchi (1972) 对 *2b 在以下例子中表达的概括提出异议；另见 McCawley (1982b [1973]:116n24, 1988.2:408ff)。

5. Chomsky and Halle, for instance, call using analogy “of dubious validity” (1968:356n12; it is difficult to put a “real” date, as opposed to a publishing date on this book. It was under development for close to a decade, first being cited as “to appear” in 1959, and generative works appealed to it frequently in the sixties; Lakoff’s 1965 thesis adapts one of its proposals). In Cartesian Linguistics, Chomsky used Bloomfield and Hockett’s appeal to analogy as a symptom of their misguidedness (1966a:12, 81 n21, 82n22). Nor has his position on analogy, except for the blip of “Remarks,” changed in any noticeable way: “Analogy seems to be a useless concept, invoked simply as an expression of ignorance as to what the operative processes and principles really are” (1988a:24). Ikeuchi (1972) disputes the generalization expressed in the following example by *2b; see also McCawley (1982b [1973]:116n24, 1988.2:408ff).

6.提到《时代》杂志与莱科夫的回忆有关：他、乔姆斯基和罗斯在乔姆斯基回来后只开了一次会，但被杂志打来的电话打断了，占用了大部分预定时间；随后的会议都被取消了。乔姆斯基接到电话当然很容易让人相信。对他时间的要求非常紧迫（例如，参见 Shenker，1971，他在第 105 页讨论了这些要求，四页后写道“乔姆斯基一如既往地不得不打断我们的谈话，去参加麻省理工学院持不同政见的教授会议，他的同事莫里斯·黑尔……代替他坐在破旧的椅子上”）。

6. The reference to Time has to do with Lakoff’s recollections: he, Chomsky, and Ross had only one meeting upon Chomsky’s return, which was interrupted by a call from the magazine which took up most of the scheduled time; subsequent meetings were cancelled. Chomsky getting the call is certainly easy enough to believe. Demands for his time were extremely pressing (see Shenker, 1971, for instance, who discusses these demands on page 105, and four pages later notes “Characteristically, Chomsky had to interrupt our conversation to attend a meeting of dissident professors at M.I.T. His colleague Morris Hale … replaced him on the dilapidated chair”).

7.莱考夫在 1967 年 11 月就“评论”讲座给乔姆斯基写了一封信，随后他将其油印出来供地下传播。这封信之所以引人入胜，有几个原因。主要是，在这种情况下，语气非常有启发性——既长篇大论又高高在上，但又很愉快。莱考夫不是那种恭敬的人，至少在有想法的时候不是，但他和乔姆斯基的地位差别很大。莱考夫是一名初级讲师。乔姆斯基除了建立了辩论的基础框架，成为北美语言学无可争议的领袖之外，还在语言学之外获得了（并将继续获得）相当大的声誉——作为理性主义的支持者、行为主义最尖锐的批评者，以及越南战争不知疲倦、尖锐的反对者。他迅速崛起，如今已广受赞誉，成为二十世纪最杰出、最具影响力的思想家之一。事实上，莱考夫在谈到六十年代末期的对手时说：“乔姆斯基是一位神圣的存在。”

7. Lakoff wrote a (November, 1967) letter to Chomsky on the “Remarks” lectures which he then mimeographed for underground circulation. It is fascinating for a number of reasons. Principally, in this context, the tone is very illuminating—haranguing and superior, but cheerful. Lakoff is not the type to be deferential, at least not when there are ideas at stake, but the difference between his and Chomsky’s statures was immense. Lakoff was a junior lecturer. Chomsky, in addition to having founded the framework which underlay the debate, and having become the unquestioned leader in North American linguistics, had gained (and was continuing to gain) considerable fame outside of linguistics—as a proponent of rationalism, as the sharpest critic of behaviorism, and as a tireless, trenchant opponent of the Vietnam War. He was rapidly ascending to the reputation he now widely holds, as one of the foremost and influential thinkers of the twentieth century. Lakoff, in fact, says of his antagonist’s position in the late sixties, “Chomsky was a Holy Presence.”

但神圣性显然没有给莱科夫带来多大障碍。他在信中的主要批评是，乔姆斯基回避了所有真正的问题，他使用了一种古老的挑衅工具——反问，来威吓他直面这些问题（当然，由于这是一封准公开信，这种坚持的作用更多的是侮辱而不是邀请）：

But holiness apparently did not present Lakoff with much of an obstacle. His principal criticism in the letter is that Chomsky is dodging all the real issues, and he uses a venerable tool of needling, the rhetorical question, to hector him about facing up to them (though, of course, since it is a quasi-public letter, the function of this insistence is more in the nature of an insult than an invitation):

有什么可以阻止这种[荒谬的]争论吗？如果没有，你为什么不接受它？（4）

Is there anything to stop this sort of [absurd] argument? If not, why don’t you embrace it? (4)

一个私人问题：你相信这一点吗？你在做语法时会使用[这个原则]作为启发式原则吗？如果不是，你能想到或设想哪些例外情况？（8）

A personal question: Do you believe this? Do you use [this principle] as a heuristic principle in doing grammar? If not, what exceptions can you think of, or envision? (8)

如果您对“自然”一词有某种语言学上相关的理解，请说出您的意思。在讲解时，您可以解释为什么根据这个标准，您对被动语态的“Δ”分析是“自然”的。（12）

If you have some linguistically relevant sense of the word ‘natural’ in mind, please say what you mean. While you’re at it, you might explain why your “by Δ” analysis of the passive is ‘natural’ by this criterion. (12)

在讨论使役句时，你为什么不回答我的 S 删除论证（在使役句论文的末尾）呢？回答这个问题至关重要。（13）

In the discussion of causatives, why don’t you answer my S-deletion argument (at the end of the causative paper)[?] It’s crucial that you do. (13)

值得注意的是，这种喋喋不休的语气，因为它可能与莱科夫在与乔姆斯基的口头冲突中所采取的立场有关，并有助于解释许多对抗性（正如值得注意的是乔姆斯基在“评论”中单独提到莱科夫，因为它可能反映了他对莱科夫作品的总体态度，并有助于解释许多对抗性）。同样值得注意的是，“评论”无论在课堂上对其思想进行了怎样的阐述，都是一篇非常粗略的论文，对 Aspects模型的实质性、广泛的修改不明确且犹豫不决；莱科夫确实有很多问题要问。

The harping tone is important to notice, since it probably has some bearing on the stance that Lakoff adopted in his oral clashes with Chomsky and helps to explain much of the antagonism (just as it is important to notice that Chomsky singles out Lakoff in “Remarks,” since it probably reflects his general attitude toward Lakoff’s work and helps to explain much of the antagonism). It is also important to note that “Remarks,” whatever elaboration its ideas got in class, is a very sketchy paper, unclear and hesitant about substantial, wide-ranging alterations to the Aspects model; Lakoff did have a lot of questions to ask.

8.乔姆斯基在此类语境中使用“决定”一词，招致了一些生成语义学家的批评，指责他用词不当。参见 Lakoff (1971b:236–37)；McCawley (1982b [1973]:66)。

8. Chomsky’s use of determine in such contexts earned him some rebukes from generative semanticists about his finesse with terminology. See Lakoff (1971b:236–37); McCawley (1982b [1973]:66).

9.另请参阅乔姆斯基（1975b:239n8），其中杰肯道夫的作用有些减弱了，尽管他的影响时间顺序仍然是错误的：

9. See also Chomsky (1975b:239n8), where Jackendoff’s role is somewhat muted, though the chronology of his influence is still wrong:

我自己对标准理论的版本是有限制的，因为我认为意义的某些方面是由表面结构决定的。到《方面》出版时，我已经确信这在很大程度上是正确的，部分原因是基于杰肯多夫的研究。

My own version of the standard theory was qualified in that I suggested that some aspects of meaning are determined by surface structure. By the time that [Aspects] appeared, I had become convinced that this was true to a significant extent, in part, on the basis of work by Jackendoff.

10.乔姆斯基论文的标题稍显不中性，即“信条，1969”。

10. The title under which Chomsky’s paper was read is only slightly less neutral, “Credo, 1969.”

11.来自“一些经验问题”（1972b[1969]）的引文的页码如下：“无趣”（137）、“空洞”（133）、“完全晦涩难懂”（148n22）、“无实质内容”（146）、“允许任何可以想象的规则”（141）、“充其量是可疑的规则”（152）、“一种极其不清楚的术语建议”（137）、“不仅没有动机而且实际上不能接受”（150）、“本质上可能是正确的”（151）、“更自然”（187）、“稍微更谨慎”（188）、“有很好的支持”（165）、“更受欢迎”（196）、“再次受欢迎”（197）、“更具限制性，因此更可取”（197）。

11. The pagination for the quotations from “Some Empirical Issues” (1972b [1969]) is: “uninteresting” (137), “vacuous” (133), “totally obscure” (148n22), “no substance” (146), “permitting any rule imaginable” (141), “at best dubious rules” (152), “a terminological proposal of an extremely unclear sort” (137), “not only unmotivated but in fact unacceptable” (150), “is probably correct, in essence,” (151) “more natural” (187), “somewhat more careful” (188), “well-supported” (165), “to be preferred” (196), “again to be preferred” (197), “more restrictive, hence preferable” (197).

12.波斯特尔当时确实发现了这些。每当引用生成语义学中的关键提议或文献时，他总是优先考虑麦考利的工作。例如，在他的《最佳理论》中，他将生成语义学描述为从“巴赫、格鲁伯以及麦考利最广泛的提议”发展而来（1972a [1969]：134）；在他的回忆文章中，他列出了包含生成语义学“重要提议”的出版物目录：一个是巴赫的，一个是格鲁伯的，两个是拉科夫的，九个是麦考利的（1971b [1969]：248）。

12. As, indeed, Postal found them at the time. Whenever citing key proposals or documents in generative semantics, he always gave McCawley’s work priority. For instance, in his “Best Theory,” he describes generative semantics as developing from proposals “by Bach, Gruber, and most extensively, McCawley” (1972a [1969]:134); in his remind paper, he gives a catalog of publications containing “the significant proposals” of generative semantics: one is by Bach, one by Gruber, two by Lakoff, and nine are by McCawley (1971b [1969]:248).

13.在 1977 年 9 月 6 日写给斯蒂芬·O·默里的一封​​信中，默里在他 1983 年出版的书的即将修订版中引用了这段话。

13. In a letter to Stephen O. Murray, 6 September 1977, quoted by Murray in his forthcoming revision of his 1983 book.

14.该论文已重新发表，并附有简短但富有启发性的后记（Schiller 等，1988：25-45）。

14. The paper has been republished with a brief but illuminating postscript (in Schiller and others, 1988:25–45).

15. Lakoff 这样解释他的评论：

15. Lakoff explains his comments this way:

当时保罗·罗森 (Paul Roazen) 刚刚出版了一本关于弗洛伊德及其圈子的书，《动物兄弟》 [1986 (1969)]。不知何故，申克尔一直在与人交谈，并听说了我们。他或其他人认为乔姆斯基有点像弗洛伊德，而我们就像荣格和阿德勒。哈伊就像陶斯克。你知道吗？他打电话来询问这件事，我说：“嗯，你看，这太愚蠢了。这非常愚蠢，而且过于简单。让我告诉你发生了什么。”

A book had just been published about Freud and his circle, by Paul Roazen, Brother Animal [1986 (1969)]. And somehow Shenker had been talking to people and had heard about us. He or somebody else had gotten the idea that Chomsky was sort of like Freud and we were like Jung and Adler. Háj was like Tausk. You know? He called up to ask about this, and I said, “Well, look, that’s pretty stupid. It’s very silly and over-simplistic. Let me tell you what’s going on.”

我和他谈了 45 分钟，他断章取义了好几句话。有一句话他从采访的不同部分截取了两半句子，然后把它们拼接在一起，简直是一派胡言。然后他谈到了乔姆斯基的“斗法肮脏”，这是对那些课程（当乔姆斯基攻击生成语义学时）和那篇关于麦考利的文章（关于他各自的论点）中发生的事情的描述。所以，这不仅仅是“乔姆斯基的斗法肮脏”。而是“鉴于这个特定情况，在这种情况下，我们发现乔姆斯基的斗法肮脏。”

I talked to him for 45 minutes, and he took several quotes out of context. For one quote he took two halves of sentences from different parts of the interview and spliced them together, so as to be utter nonsense. And then he took this thing about Chomsky fights dirty, which was a description of what had happened in those classes [when Chomsky was attacking generative semantics] and in that article about McCawley [regarding his respectively argument]. So, it wasn’t just “Chomsky fights dirty in general.” It was “given this particular instance, in that case, what we found was Chomsky fights dirty.”

我还应该说，这是我第一次接受记者采访，也是我最后一次接受这样的事情，因为我发现他们会断章取义，并把你没有说过的话拼凑在一起。

I should also say that it was the first time I was ever interviewed by a reporter, and the last time I will ever do anything like that, because I discovered that they take things out of context and piece quotes together that you don’t say.

莱考夫试图澄清其评论的动机是可以理解的，因为该引文在某种程度上使他蒙受了耻辱。但该评论并不罕见。事实上，它的唯一独特之处是它出现在《纽约时报》上。针对乔姆斯基的修辞不诚实的公开指控（主要是在政治方面，但也在语言学方面）很多，而私下的不诚实指控则更多。

Lakoff’s motivation for trying to clarify his comment is understandable, since the quotation has stigmatized him to some degree. But the remark is not at all uncommon. Indeed, its sole claim to uniqueness is that it showed up in The New York Times. Published accusations of rhetorical dishonesty against Chomsky (largely in politics, but also in linguistics) are numerous, and off-the-record accusations of dishonesty are even more numerous.

第七章

Chapter 7

1.这段引文来自 Nuel Pharr Davis (1968:314)。引文的引言如下，没有给出指控这些言论的人的名字，但它们非常符合当时的气氛和 Alvarez 的感受（据记载，他与 Teller、Latimer、Pitzer 和 Griggs 一起发誓认为 Oppenheimer 会带来安全风险）：

1. The quotation is from Nuel Pharr Davis (1968:314). The introduction to the quotation, as follows, does not give the name of the person alleging the remarks, but they fit the temper of the times and Alvarez’s feelings well (he is on record, along with Teller, Latimer, Pitzer, and Griggs as swearing that he thought Oppenheimer to be a security risk):

原子能机构的一位领导人说，1954 年，他听到了阿尔瓦雷斯被愤怒和沮丧影响的暗示，这让他感到震惊：“我记得我和阿尔瓦雷斯进行了一次令人震惊的谈话。那是在听证会之前（关于奥本海默的爱国主义）。我想澄清的是，我不是在转述他的话，而是试图重建他的推理。他似乎在告诉我‘奥本海默和我……’”。

One of the leaders of the atomic establishment says that he was appalled by an intimation he caught in 1954 of the way anger and frustration had affected Alvarez’ mind: “I remember a shocking conversation I had with Alvarez. It was before the Hearings [into Oppenheimer’s patriotism]. I want to make it clear that I am not giving his words but trying to reconstruct his reasoning. What he seemed to be telling me was ‘Oppenheimer and I …’”.

2.有关此论证形式的早期版本，即乔姆斯基在与布隆菲尔德主义者对峙时对其进行试行营销时，请参阅乔姆斯基 (1964d [1963]:54n18)，其中博林格要么 (1) 错了，要么可能 (2) 说了与乔姆斯基相同的话。有关较新的版本，请参阅他对加兹达尔的评论，即广义短语结构语法大致上是转换语法的符号等价物，只是在某些地方有“不必要的复杂性”，这使它不如转换语法 (Longuet-Higgins 等人 (1981:[64f])。

2. For an earlier version of this argument form, when Chomsky was test-marketing it against a Bloomfieldian, see Chomsky (1964d [1963]:54n18), where Bolinger is either (1) wrong, or possibly (2) saying the same thing as Chomsky. For a more recent version, see his comments to Gazdar that generalized phrase structure grammar is, loosely, a notational equivalent of transformational grammar, except for its “needless complexity” in places, which makes it inferior (Longuet-Higgins and others (1981 :[64f]).

3.例如，在密尔沃基举行的理论比较会议上（Moravcsik and Wirth，1980），一篇油印论文被广为流传，涉及似是而非的评价论点，例如“声称‘你的理论是我的理论的一个符号变体，它是错误的’”（Lawler，1980：59n14，引用或解释K. Whistler 等人的话）。

3. At a theory-comparison conference in Milwaukee (Moravcsik and Wirth, 1980), for instance, where a mimeograph paper made the rounds, concerning specious evaluation arguments such as “the claim that ‘Your theory is a notational variant of mine, and it’s wrong’” (Lawler, 1980:59n14, quoting or paraphrasing K. Whistler and others).

4.缺乏清晰度主要与乔姆斯基的陈述有关，他的陈述有些混乱。特别是，他没有非常具体地说明标准理论的含义。重构乔姆斯基的论证（这始终是一项非常冒险的事业），标准理论不仅意味着直接的Aspects模型，还意味着该模型的几个抽象语法扩展 — 尤其是罗斯的岛屿约束、珀尔穆特的深层和表面结构输出条件、波斯特尔的交叉约束，也许还有其他一些创新。通过这种解释，标准理论在其经验预测中确实看起来相当接近生成语义学。但符号变体指控仍然不太令人信服。乔姆斯基的意思并不是所有的抽象语法扩展——特别是，他似乎排除了 Lakoff 的规则特征、词汇例外和词汇分解工作——大多数人认为词汇分解领域是两种模型之间差异的最佳裁定领域。他还显然将自己的词汇学家和 x-bar 提案纳入了标准理论包中，而生成语义学家对此予以驳斥，如果乔姆斯基认为这些提案是合理的，他大概就不会提出这些提案了。与模型没有经验差异（这些提议与他所说的各种语法成分之间的“交易关系”有关，他说，“语法各个成分之间的适当平衡完全是一个经验问题。我们对各个部分之间的‘交易关系’没有先验的洞察”—1972b [1967]：13）。

4. The lack of clarity had mostly to do with Chomsky’s presentation, which was something of a mess. In particular, he failed to be very specific about what standard theory meant. Reconstructing Chomsky’s argument (always a very risky enterprise), standard theory meant not just the immediate Aspects model, but also several of the abstract syntax extensions of that model—especially, Ross’s island constraints, Perlmutter’s deep and surface structure output conditions, Postal’s crossover constraints, and perhaps a few other innovations. With this construal, the standard theory does indeed look fairly close to generative semantics in its empirical predictions. But the notational variants charge still doesn’t hold very convincingly. Chomsky did not mean all of the abstract syntax extensions—in particular, he seems to have excluded Lakoff’s rule features, lexical exceptions, and lexical decomposition work—and it was in the area of lexical decomposition that most people thought the differences between the two models could be best adjudicated. He also apparently included his own lexicalist and x-bar proposals in the standard-theory package, which the generative semanticists repudiated, and which, presumably, Chomsky wouldn’t have proposed had he thought they made no empirical difference to the model (the proposals have to do with what he calls “trading relations” among various grammatical components, and he says that “the proper balance between various components of the grammar is entirely an empirical issue. We have no a priori insight into the ‘trading relation’ between various parts”—1972b [1967]:13).

乔姆斯基在 70 年代中期仍然公开坚持（例如，1975b:238n2），并且私下里继续坚持，这两个模型本质上是符号变体。但当时这个论点毫无意义（再次，除了卡茨），现在也难以令人信服。一些乔姆斯基主义者似乎已经接受了它。例如，塔尔米·吉翁（Talmy Givón）直到 1969 年德克萨斯会议之前都是生成语义学的同情者，当时

Chomsky was still publicly insisting in the mid-seventies (for instance, 1975b:238n2), and continues to insist privately, that the two models were essentially notational variants. But the argument was a nonstarter then (again, excepting Katz), and unconvincing now. Some Chomskyans appear to have bought it. Talmy Givón, for instance, was a generative-semantics sympathizer until the 1969 Texas conference, when

我终于明白了（我有点迟钝），这场“大辩论”不涉及实证问题，更不用说理论问题了；只涉及形式主义和自负。所以我说“你们两家都遭殃了”。……[我不再需要]任何一种立场。

it finally dawned on me (I’m kinda slow) that the “great debate” involved no empirical issues, let alone theory; only formalisms and egos. So I said “plague on both your houses.” … [I no longer have] any use for either position.

而在辩论的相当后期，罗纳德·兰盖克（Ronald Langacker）（也曾一度支持生成语义学）抱怨道：“无论这些理论看起来有多么不同，在大多数方面它们本质上是等价的”（1976a:99）。但没有人，甚至连卡茨也没有在这场论证中发现任何理由来采纳乔姆斯基用这个论证来推广的模型。事实上，正如我们稍后会看到的那样，符号变体论证对非语言学家（以及某种程度上远离行动的语言学家）的影响最为明显，它强化了这样一种观点，即所有的不和都是因为一些非常琐碎的事情，因此这场论证对乔姆斯基的损害至少与对他的对手的损害一样大——两院似乎都陷入了瘟疫之中。

And, considerably later in the debate, Ronald Langacker (also aligned for a time with generative semantics) complained that “however different the theories may look, in most respects they are essentially equivalent” (1976a:99). But no one, not even Katz, found in the argument any reason to adopt the model Chomsky was using the argument to promote. Indeed, the clearest impact of the notational variants argument, as we will see somewhat later, was among nonlinguists (and, to some extent, among linguists far from the action), with whom it reinforced the idea that all the bad blood was over something very trivial, and the argument therefore damaged Chomsky at least as much as it damaged his opponents—both houses seemed plague ridden.

5.在此之前，还有另外三个反对深层结构的论点：Lakoff 和 Ross 未发表且极具暗示性的《深层结构是必要的吗？》；Bach (1968 [1967]:119–21)，该论点仅被简要概述，很少引起人们的注意（有关讨论，请参阅 Janet Dean Fodor，1980:124ff）；以及 McCawley (1976b [1967]:103–17)，该论点更适合于支持句法和语义的统一，而不是反对深层结构。它们都没有 McCawley各自论点的简单形式结构。此外，Fillmore (1968 [1967]:88) 评论说：“从 Chomsky 及其学生的著作中为人所熟知的句法深层结构很可能将走上音素的老路”，但没有提出任何论据。

5. Three other arguments against deep structure predate this one: Lakoff and Ross’s unpublished and extremely allusive “Is Deep Structure Necessary?”; Bach (1968 [1967]:119–21), which is only briefly sketched and attracted very little attention (see Janet Dean Fodor, 1980:124ff, for discussion); and McCawley (1976b [1967]:103–17), which is more properly an argument for the unity of syntax and semantics than an argument against deep structure. None of them have the simple formal structure of McCawley’s respectively argument. Additionally, Fillmore (1968 [1967]:88) comments that “it is likely that the syntactic deep structure of the type that has been made familiar from the work of Chomsky and his students is going to go the way of the phoneme,” but offers no argument.

6.他说，McCawley 的论证依赖于按照以下顺序从 (i) 推导出 (iv)：

6. He says that McCawley’s argument depends on the derivation of (iv) from (i) in the following sequence:

（i） (∀x) （x ∊ {Larry, Tom} & x 爱 x 的妻子）

(i) (∀x) (x ∊ {Larry, Tom} & x loves x’s wife)

（ii）拉里爱拉里的妻子，汤姆爱汤姆的妻子。

(ii) Larry loves Larry’s wife and Tom loves Tom’s wife.

（iii）拉里和汤姆分别爱拉里的妻子和汤姆的妻子。

(iii) Larry and Tom love Larry’s wife and Tom’s wife, respectively.

（iv）拉里和汤姆爱他们各自的妻子。

(iv) Larry and Tom love their respective wives.

现在，乔姆斯基说，从 (i) 到 (ii) 的移动当然是语义的，但 (ii) ⇒ (iii) ⇒ (iv) 是句法移动：现象不是单一的，语义动作与句法动作以与 Aspects 模型完全兼容的方式分开。他还错误地说，Respectively转换从 3b 推导出 2b，而忽略了提到像 4b 这样的表示是图景的一部分，因此 McCawley 的推导在这里看起来严格是句法的（因此无关紧要）。除了歪曲事实之外，他还在短短的讨论中多次指责 McCawley 含糊其辞（关于“ Respectively转换”一词），这让人对 McCawley 的正直（如果是故意的）或敏锐度（如果不是）产生了相当大的怀疑。

Now, Chomsky says, the move from (i) to (ii) is certainly semantic, but (ii) ⇒ (iii) ⇒ (iv) are syntactic moves: the phenomenon is not unitary, and the semantic action is partitioned away from the syntactic action in a way completely compatible with the Aspects model. He also says, incorrectly, that the Respectively transformation derives 2b from 3b, and neglects to mention that a representation like 4b is part of the picture, so McCawley’s derivation here looks strictly syntactic (and, therefore, irrelevant). Beyond the distortion, he also accuses McCawley of equivocation (on the term, “Respectively transformation”) frequently enough in the short discussion to cast considerable doubt on either McCawley’s integrity (if intentional) or his acumen (if not).

拉科夫 (Lakoff) 素来以不以德报怨著称，他公开为麦考利辩护，并如此指责乔姆斯基：

Lakoff, not known for turning the other cheek, took up the public gauntlet for McCawley, and accused Chomsky thusly:

乔姆斯基将 [这一立场] 描述为麦考利接受的立场，而不是他拒绝的立场。然后他继续指出，正如麦考利所做的那样，这种立场是站不住脚的，因为它对复数的处理不充分。基于此，他声称已经抹黑了麦考利的立场，以及生成语义学。（1971b:275）

Chomsky describes [this position] as the position McCawley accepts rather than the one he rejects. He then proceeds to point out, as did McCawley, that such a position is untenable because of its inadequate handling of plurals. On the basis of this, he claims to have discredited McCawley’s position in particular and generative semantics in general. (1971b:275)

为了更好地理解，还补充了对乔姆斯基案例的评价，该评价与乔姆斯基对麦考利案例的评价完全一致：

Adding, for good measure, an appraisal of Chomsky’s case that mirrors identically Chomsky’s appraisal of McCawley’s case:

乔姆斯基的说法……麦考利在本文中没有提出任何新观点，这是基于他对“深层结构”一词使用的含糊其辞，而当这种含糊其辞被消除时，这种说法也就不攻自破了。

Chomsky’s claim … that McCawley has not proposed anything new in this paper is based on an equivocation in his use of the term ‘deep structure’ and collapses when the equivocation is removed.

乔姆斯基回答说：

Chomsky replied:

拉科夫……声称我试图从麦考利零散的论证中重建的立场实际上是麦考利拒绝的立场，而不是他提出的立场。由于拉科夫根本没有为这一说法提供任何论证（具体来说，没有提及麦考利的文本），也没有指出我的重建（基于麦考利文本中的引述评论）在哪些方面是不准确的，因此我无法对他的主张发表评论——尽管它可能是正确的，因为正如我在那里明确指出的那样，重建麦考利的论点相当困难。（1972b [1969]：147n22）

Lakoff … claims that the position I tried to reconstruct from McCawley’s scattered argument is actually a position that McCawley rejects, rather than one he proposes. Since Lakoff gives no argument at all for this claim (specifically, no reference to McCawley’s text) and does not indicate in what my reconstruction, which was based on cited comments from McCawley’s text, is inaccurate, I cannot comment on his claim—though it may be correct, for as I noted there explicitly, it is quite difficult to reconstruct McCawley’s argument. (1972b [1969]:147n22)

事实上，乔姆斯基在最初的讨论中并没有明确表示麦考利的论证难以重构，甚至没有说他的陈述是一种重构，尽管有两个文本线索可以说明这一点（“那么，麦考利可能打算……”和“麦考利似乎在想……”—1972b [1968]:78）；实际上，陈述表明所有内容都直接来自麦考利的论文。让混乱进一步加剧的是道格蒂 (1975:268n4)，他不知何故发现拉科夫同意乔姆斯基的说法，即麦考利的论证是模棱两可的。顺便说一句，道格蒂确实更接近麦考利论证的真正问题——事实上，麦考利在与乔姆斯基的通信中以及在乔姆斯基发表其重构的书籍的评论文章中都做到了这一点 (1982b [1973]:39–41)。

Chomsky did not in fact say explicitly in the original discussion that McCawley’s argument is difficult to reconstruct, or even that his presentation is a reconstruction, though there are two textual clues to these ends (“Presumably, then, McCawley intends…” and “McCawley seems to have in mind …”—1972b [1968]:78); the presentation, actually, suggests that everything comes pretty directly from McCawley’s paper. Adding to the confusion is Dougherty (1975:268n4), who somehow finds Lakoff to agree with Chomsky’s claim that McCawley’s respectively argument is an equivocation. Dougherty, by the way, does get closer to the real problems of McCawley’s argument—as, in fact, McCawley does, both in correspondence with Chomsky and in a review article of the book in which Chomsky published his reconstruction (1982b [1973]:39–41).

7.参见 McCawley (1976b [1967]:121–32; 1972:535–38; 1982b [1973]:39–41; 1988.2:536–41)；另见 Green (1974 [1972]:7, 27–28)，他指出，即使生成语义学家不愿意承认 McCawley 论证的全部力量，他们也认为这至少表明深层结构存在问题。在回应乔姆斯基的攻击时，Lakoff 对 McCawley 的论证进行了相当清晰的陈述 (1971b:273–77)，但最终只得到了不冷不热的认可。Lakoff 还提出了一些 Hallean 类型的论证和其他结构 (1972b:547–59)。

7. See McCawley (1976b [1967]:121–32; 1972:535–38; 1982b [1973]:39–41; 1988.2:536–41); see also Green (1974 [1972]:7, 27–28), who indicates that even if generative semanticists were not willing to acknowledge the full force of McCawley’s argument, they felt it at least indicated something was wrong with deep structure. In responding to Chomsky’s attack, Lakoff gives a fairly clear presentation of McCawley’s argument (1971b:273–77), but ends up only with a lukewarm endorsement. Lakoff also offers some Hallean-type arguments with other constructions (1972b:547–59).

8.乔姆斯基在写给麦考利的一封信（1967 年 12 月 20 日）中就深层结构发表了上述评论；另请参见他在《逻辑结构》（1975a [1955]：93）中的类似评论，尽管它们与深层结构无关。

8. Chomsky’s remark was in a letter to McCawley (20 December 1967) over deep structure; see also his similar comments in Logical Structure (1975a [1955]:93), though they don’t concern deep structure.

9. McCawley 实际上认识到了举证责任在哪里，这一点从他向 LSA 提出的相关论点的坦率评论中可以清楚地看出：

9. That McCawley actually recognized where the burden of proof lay is clear from his frank comments about a presentation of the respectively argument to the LSA:

我在 1967 年 12 月的 LSA 会议上撰写并介绍了“[深层结构和自主句法] 各自的缺陷”，即腐蚀年轻人，特别是为了刺激他们基于涉及生成语义的模型进行研究。……我将其描述为“腐蚀年轻人”，不应被视为表示我对刚刚勾勒出的模型有任何不满，事实上我认为这是正确的。它反而表明我打算对模型勾勒产生比现有知识所保证的更多的信心，我认为这是一个理想的目标，因为不可能得出大量关于是否存在语言学上语义和表层结构之间是否存在显著的层次关系（即是否存在深层结构），直到大量的研究者尝试去忽略这一层次。（1976b[1967]：129-130）

I had an ulterior motive in writing and presenting ‘The respective downfalls [of deep structure and autonomous syntax]’ at the Dec. 1967 LSA meeting, namely corruption of the young, specifically stimulating them to do research based on a model which involved generative semantics. … My description of this as ‘corruption of the young’ should not be taken as indicating any disapproval on my part of the model just sketched, which I in fact consider to be correct. It rather indicates that I intended to generate more confidence in that sketch of a model than is warranted by current knowledge, which I consider a desirable goal in that it will not be possible to get a sizeable body of conclusions bearing on whether there is a linguistically significant level between semantics and surface structure [that is, whether there is a deep structure] until a sizeable body of research is done in which the researcher tried to do without such a level. (1976b [1967]:129–30)

顺便说一句，尽管生成语义学家对此表示抗议，但几乎所有其他人显然也意识到，举证责任落在了深层结构的挑战者身上，而不是捍卫者身上。生成语义学家提出了许多反对深层结构的负面论据，但支持深层结构的正面论据却寥寥无几（Chomsky，1972b [1968]：85–86，[1969]：151–62）。

Despite the generative semanticists’ protests to the contrary, by the way, virtually everyone else apparently also realized that the burden of proof fell on the challengers, not the defenders, of deep structure. Generative semanticists mounted a number of negative arguments against it, but there were only a few positive arguments on its behalf (Chomsky, 1972b [1968]:85–86, [1969]:151–62).

10. STRIKES -LIKE分析源自 Postal 的一篇著名论文（“论表面动词‘提醒’”—1971b [1969]—Ross 仍称之为“对生成语义学的最佳表述……一个美妙的论证”。Postal 使用谓词提升法来论证，对提醒这个词最有启发性的分析不是将其作为一个三位单纯形动词（x 使 y 想起 z），而是将其作为一个由两个两位原子谓词组成的复合词（[ x LIKE Z] STRIKES y）。另见 Lakoff (1971b:246–52)从x CAUSE y INTEND NOT推导出dissuade，Postal (1988a [1969]:85–86)从MEAT FROM PIGS推导出pork，以及 Binnick (1971)从x CAUSE y TO COME推导出bring。

10. The STRIKES-LIKE analysis is due to a famous paper by Postal (“On the Surface Verb ‘Remind’”—1971b [1969]—which Ross still calls “the best articulation of what generative semantics is about … a beautiful argument.” Postal uses Predicate-raising to argue that the most revealing analysis of the word remind is not as a three-place simplex verb (x reminds y of z), but a complex of two two-place atomic predicates ([x LIKE Z] STRIKES y). See also Lakoff’s (1971b:246–52) derivation of dissuade from x CAUSE y INTEND NOT, Postal’s (1988a [1969]:85–86) derivation of pork from MEAT FROM PIGS, and Binnick’s (1971) derivation of bring from x CAUSE y TO COME.

最著名的支持论据是摩根的歧义范围论据和可能词论据（摩根、麦考利和邮政等提出了各种版本）。

The most famous support arguments are Morgan’s scope-of-ambiguity argument and the possible-word argument (available in various versions from Morgan, McCawley, and Postal).

Morgan (1969b:62–65) 认为 (i)-a 有几种歧义，分别对应于 (i)-b 到 (i)-d。

Morgan (1969b:62–65) argued that (i)-a is several ways ambiguous, corresponding to (i)-b through (i)-d.

（i）拉尔夫差点杀死爱丽丝。

(i) a Ralph almost killed Alice.

b 拉尔夫差点导致爱丽丝失去生命。

b Ralph almost caused Alice to become not alive.

[也就是说，他差点做了一些会害死她的事情。]

[I.e., he almost did something that would have killed her.]

c 拉尔夫害得爱丽丝几乎活不下去了。

c Ralph caused Alice to almost become not alive.

[即，他做了一些几乎导致她死亡的事情，例如在驾驶公共汽车时险些撞到她。]

[I.e., he did something which almost caused her to die such as narrowly missing her while driving his bus.]

d 拉尔夫导致爱丽丝几乎失去生命迹象。

d Ralph caused Alice to become almost not alive.

[即，他做了一些让她差点丧命的事情，比如用他的公共汽车撞到她，使她受了几乎致命的伤。]

[I.e., he did something which caused her to almost die such as hitting her with his bus and injuring her near fatally.]

可能词论证稍微微妙一些，它依赖于谓词提升如何与 Ross 在其论文中开创的那种移动规则约束相结合。为了说明这一点，Ross 曾主张一种他称之为并列结构约束的移动禁令，该禁令规定移动变换不能从连体短语中提取材料。考虑 (ii)-a 和 (ii)-b，其中变换语法与一种被称为主题化和Y 移动的规则相关：

The possible-word argument is a little more subtle, resting on how Predicate-raising combines with constraints on movement rules of the sort Ross had pioneered in his dissertation. To illustrate, Ross had argued for a movement prohibition he called the coordinate structure constraint, which says that movement transformations can’t extract material from conjoined phrases. Consider (ii)-a and (ii)-b, which transformational grammar related with a rule variously called Topicalization and Y-movement:

(ii) a 我喜欢马蹄铁。

(ii) a I like horseshoes.

b 马蹄铁，我喜欢。

b Horseshoes, I like.

但没有像 (iii) 中那样的对应句子对：

But there are no corresponding pairs of sentences like those in (iii):

(iii) a 我喜欢马蹄铁和手榴弹。

(iii) a I like Horseshoes and hand grenades.

b *手榴弹，我喜欢马蹄铁和。

b *Handgrenades, I like horseshoes and.

这种现象非常普遍，而且非常明确，其他几种移动限制也是如此。将移动限制研究与词汇项是移动转换（特别是谓词提升）的结果这一提议结合起来，生成语义学家就可以对词汇的内容做出实质性的主张。特别是，他们可以声称某些类型的词在任何语言中都是不可能出现的（参见，例如，Morgan，1969b：52-53，McCawley，1976b [1971]：327-29）。可能的词论证过程非常简单：单词源于移动规则的假设预示着不存在违反移动约束的单词；例如，不存在任何单词splarm，使得 (iv)-a 意味着 (iv)-b：

The phenomenon is extremely general, and very well established, as are several other movement constraints. Combining the research on movement constraints with the proposal that lexical items are the result of movement transformations (in particular, Predicate-raising), allowed the generative semanticists to make substantive claims about the content of the lexicon. In particular, they could claim that certain types of words were impossible in any language (see, e.g., Morgan, 1969b:52–53, McCawley, 1976b [1971]:327–29). The possibleword argument proceeds very simply: the hypothesis that words arise from movement rules predicts there can be no words which violate movement constraints; for instance, that there can be no word, splarm, such that (iv)-a means (iv)-b:

(iv) 我发射手榴弹。

(iv) a I splarm handgrenades.

b 我喜欢马蹄铁和手榴弹。

b I like horseshoes and handgrenades.

也就是说，不可能存在像“喜欢马蹄铁和”这样意思的词。

That is, there can be no word which means something like “to like horseshoes and.”

争论基本结束后，一位开始研究蒙塔古语法 (Montague Grammar)的新框架的前生成语义学家提出了可能词论证的巨大困难 (Dowty, 1979:237–38)。

After the dispute was pretty much over, a former generative semanticist who had begun working in a new framework called Montague Grammar raised formidable difficulties for the possible-word argument (Dowty, 1979:237–38).

11.关于他对模糊范围论证的反驳，参见1972b[1969]:150，关于他对可能词论证的反驳，参见1972b[1969]:143。

11. For his counter-arguments to the scope-of-ambiguity argument, see 1972b [1969]:150, for his counter-arguments to the possible-word argument, 1972b [1969]:143.

12.这有点像是转移注意力的花招，因为 McCawley 还发现了证据，表明在他的假设中，一些较为成熟的转换有时必须先于词汇插入，但这些论点的影响不如涉及谓词提升的论点那么大，因为所有其他转换在此期间都在不断修订，其中一些随后被解释主义者抛弃了。

12. This was something of a red herring, since McCawley also found evidence that, within his assumptions, some of the more established transformations sometimes must precede lexical insertion, but these arguments had less of an impact than the one involving Predicateraising, since all of the other transformations were under steady revision in this period and several of them were subsequently discarded by the interpretivists.

13.当然，由于意义保存问题（不适用于句法结构的转换，但适用于体），转换理论已经发生了显著变化。不同之处在于，现在转换语言学家已经分成了两个互相敌对的渠道。

13. Of course, transformational theory had already changed markedly as a result of the issues surrounding meaning preservation (which didn’t hold of transformations in Syntactic Structures but did in Aspects). The difference was that now transformational linguists had forked into two mutually hostile channels.

14.也就是说，Katz-Postal 原则在Aspects环境中只是一个工作假设；Chomsky 对此表示了温和的保留，而 S.-Y. Kuroda 和 Paul Chapin（两人都是 Chomsky 的博士生）明确拒绝了该原则（前者是因为量词范围问题，后者是因为名词化——Kuroda，（1969[1965]；Chapin，1967）；而 Fillmore 准备在转向格语法时放宽该原则（1966、1968 [1967]、1969 [1966]）。它被普遍认为是对转换语法的一个受欢迎的补充，但它离教条还很远。它只是随着生成语义学的出现才成为教条。

14. The Katz-Postal principle, that is, was only a working hypothesis in the Aspects milieu; one which Chomsky expressed mild reservations about, and which S.-Y. Kuroda and Paul Chapin, both of whom were Chomsky’s doctoral students, had explicitly rejected (the former because of quantifier scope issues, the latter because of nominalizations—Kuroda, (1969[1965]; Chapin, 1967); and which Fillmore was prepared to relax in his move toward case grammar (1966, 1968 [1967], 1969 [1966]). It was generally regarded as a welcome addition to transformational grammar, but it was a long way from dogma. It only became dogma with the advent of generative semantics.

15. McCawley 也在逻辑形式上找到了一种巧妙的方法来解决这一违规行为 (1976b[1967]:108–9)。

15. McCawley also had an elegant way around this violation in terms of logical form (1976b [1967]:108–9).

16. 浅结构是 Postal 用来描述应用所有循环变换之后和任何后循环变换之前的层次的术语。

16. Shallow structure was Postal’s term for the level after the application of all cyclic transformations and before any post-cyclic transformations.

17.达尔文虽然没有乔姆斯基那样激动，但也持有类似的观点，即“只有战胜一切攻击，才能了解真理”（1859 年 11 月 26 日致塞奇威克的信）；他虽然没有乔姆斯基那样尖刻，但也对一些批评者颇为严厉，在攻击中使用了歪曲事实（如对马修和布莱斯的描述——参见 Clark，1986 [1984]：142f）和讽刺（如 1859 年 12 月 5 日他写给莱尔的信，谈到菲茨罗伊和巴克兰被解雇一事，他的家人从他的自传中删去了这部分内容）。

17. Darwin, though not given to Chomsky’s level of agonism, had the similar view that “truth can only be known by rising victorious from every attack” (letter to Sedgwick, 26 November 1859), and, though not given to Chomsky’s level of acerbity, also had rather harsh things to say about some of his critics, using in his attacks misrepresentation (as in his characterizations of Matthew and Blyth—see Clark, 1986 [1984]:142f) and ridicule (as in his comments to Lyell, 5 December 1859, about FitzRoy and the dismissal of Buckland, which his family expurgated from his autobiography).

18.这一论述尤其体现在两本重要著作《生成语法中的语义解释》（1972 年）和《X-bar 句法》（1977 年）以及一篇重要论文《词典中的形态和语义规律》（1975 年）。

18. The fleshing-out comes especially in two important books, Semantic Interpretation in Generative Grammar (1972), and X-bar Syntax (1977), and an important paper, “Morphological and Semantic Regularities in the Lexicon” (1975).

19.乔姆斯基的著作中，唯一可能与他作为扩展的标准理论的表达相媲美的，是他的《生成语法中的语义学研究》（1972b），但它只是收集了他的反生成语义学三部曲，即《关于规范化的评论》、《深层结构、表层结构和语义解释》和《转换语法理论中的一些经验问题》。

19. The one possible contender in Chomsky’s oeuvre as an articulation of the extended standard theory is his Studies on Semantics in Generative Grammar (1972b), but it just collects his anti-generative semantics trilogy, “Remarks on Nomalization,” “Deep Structure, Surface Structure, and Semantic Interpretation,” and “Some Empirical Issues in the Theory of Transformational Grammar.”

20.例如，他的第一部主要著作采用了-notation 作为一些短语结构规则，但似乎不好意思将这些惯例扩展到其他规则（例如，1972:60ff）。特别是，他只对名词短语使用 - 语法，就像乔姆斯基一样——这一举动必定强化了这样的印象：这种符号是乔姆斯基临时起草的，目的是让自己摆脱因放弃派生名词的转换性解释而陷入的解释困境。在这里讨论这些建议或杰肯多夫对它们的处理会离题太远，它们与乔姆斯基最初的建议有很大不同，但词汇冗余规则和- 符号都标志着语法理论的重要重新概念化，有助于定义自 70 年代中期以来的形式语言学，而杰肯多夫是它们成功的主要原因。

20. His first major work, for instance, adopts -notation for some phrase structure rules, but seems embarrassed to extend the conventions to other rules (e.g., 1972:60ff). In particular, he uses -syntax only for noun phrases, as had Chomsky—a move that must have reinforced the impression that the notation was an ad hoc convenience Chomsky had drafted to get himself out of the explanatory pickle he was in for having dropped a transformational account of derived nominals. It would take us too far afield here to discuss either these proposals or Jackendoff’s treatment of them, which diverged significantly from Chomsky’s original suggestions, but both lexical redundancy rules and -notation mark important reconceptualizations of grammatical theory, helping to define formal linguistics since the midseventies, and Jackendoff is a major reason for their success.

21.在一些解释中，Jackendoff 的语义表征有四个部分，它们的含义相同。有关其模型结构的最清晰说明，请参阅 Jackendoff (1972:3)。

21. In some construals, Jackendoff had one semantic representation with four parts, which amounts to the same thing. See Jackendoff (1972:3) for the clearest account of his model’s architecture.

22.然而，丑陋也与野心相对应：Jackendoff (1972) 除了应用比 Katz 和 Fodor (1964b [1963])、Katz 和 Postal (1964) 或 Chomsky (1965 [1964]) 更细粒度的语义标准之外，还解释了更多类型的语义现象，例如焦点、预设和模态结构。

22. The ugliness also corresponded to the ambition, however: Jackendoff (1972), in addition to applying much finer grained semantic criteria than Katz and Fodor (1964b [1963]), Katz and Postal (1964), or Chomsky (1965 [1964]), also accounts for many more types of semantic phenomena, like focus, presupposition, and modal structure.

23.在生成语义学家的回顾中，杰肯道夫也表现得相当不错。情绪高涨时，他被认为不过是一只大嘴巴的鹦鹉，重复着乔姆斯基充满愤怒的反生成主义，但现在他几乎总是被挑出来，成为解释语义学家中一个值得尊敬的例外。例如，麦考利 (1982b:8) 热情地感谢杰肯道夫的帮助和见解。事实上，尽管杰肯道夫和生成语义学家之间发生了几次非常激烈的冲突（或者可能是因为他们），但他们倾向于把他视为同志，而且形式上有一些相似之处。正如 Kac 所说，“[语义解释] 最明显的缺陷是它与它所反对的东西有太多共同之处”（1975:23），而且这种相似性不仅仅是形式上的：毒品、政治和普遍的愚蠢（生成阵营的文体倾向）在他的例句中发挥了作用；他是迄今为止解释语义学家中最轻松的文体家（在清晰度方面只有 McCawley 能与之匹敌）；他坦率地承认分析中的不足；在引用数据来源方面，他几乎和生成语义学家一样坚持不懈。他也不吝惜内部笑话，经常借用生成主义论文（Max、Irving、Seymour）最喜欢的专有名词，甚至设法找到一种合法的方式来引用 Quang 最好的语法并置：

23. Jackendoff, too, has fared quite well in the retrospections of generative semanticists. When feelings ran high, he was considered little more than a loud-mouthed parrot, repeating Chomsky’s bile-infused contra-generativism, but he is now almost always singled out as an honorable exception among the scabrous horde of interpretive semanticists. McCawley (1982b:8), for instance, warmly acknowledges Jackendoff’s help and insights. Indeed, despite the several very fierce confrontations between Jackendoff and the generative semanticists (or perhaps because of them), they tend to regard him as something of a comrade, and there are certain similarities of form. As Kac puts it, “the most conspicuous failing of [Semantic Interpretation] is that it has too much in common with what it purports to oppose” (1975:23), and the resemblance was not just formal: drugs, politics, and general goofiness (the stylistic proclivities of the generative camp) play a role in his sample sentences; he is the breeziest stylist of the intepretive semanticists by far (and matched in lucidity only by McCawley); he is frank about gaps in his analyses; and he is almost as relentless as the generative semanticists about citing his data sources. Nor is he above the practice of in-jokes, often co-opting the favorite proper nouns of generativist papers (Max, Irving, Seymour), and even managing to find a legitimate way to cite Quang’s best grammaticality juxtaposition:

（i）淹死那只该死的猫。

(i) Drown the fucking cat.

（ii）*淹死那只正在做爱的猫。[错误意思]

(ii) *Drown that cat which is fucking. [wrong meaning]

更重要的是，他与他们一样，对意义有着强烈的担忧。例如，任何生成语义学家都可能发出这样的呼吁：“我们需要对语义进行更严肃的研究，而不是将语义简化为句法术语，而不是现在流行的那种研究”（Jackendoff，1971：142）。

More importantly, he shared most of their driving concerns about meaning. This call, for instance, could have come from any generative semanticist: “[We need] a much more serious study of semantics—and not semantics reduced to syntactic terms—than has been fashionable” (Jackendoff, 1971:142).

24.我删去了Lakoff对相关文本的引用（引文来自Lakoff，1970b：627）。

24. I have snipped out Lakoff’s citations to the relevant texts (the quotation is from Lakoff, 1970b:627).

25.我颠倒了这段引文的两部分顺序（用省略号隔开）。乔姆斯基在这里的一般观点是罗斯对一个全局提议的讨论的结果，但他显然认为模糊性问题也适用于拉科夫（例如，1972b [1969]：141）；《邮政》得到了略微更好的处理（第 140 页）。

25. I have reversed the order of the two sections of this quotation (separated by the elision dots). Chomsky’s general points here follow on a discussion of a global proposal by Ross, but he obviously regards the vagueness problem to hold for Lakoff as well (e.g., 1972b [1969]:141); Postal gets marginally better treatment (p. 140).

26.与乔姆斯基的贝壳和豌豆数据游戏相关的术语“wild cards”来自 Lakoff (1967) 对“名词化评论”的回应。Postal 的评论在这里略有修改。我的论文中引用了一段包含这些评论的较长段落（Harris，1990：381-82）。

26. The term “wild cards” in connection with Chomsky’s shell-and-pea data game comes from Lakoff’s (1967) response to “Remarks on Nominalization.” Postal’s comments here have been edited slightly. A longer passage containing these remarks is quoted in my dissertation (Harris, 1990:381–82).

27.乔姆斯基在辩论的这个阶段并没有说出复杂性的优点。一段时间以来，复杂性一直是他论证中的一个重要暗流。转型例如，语法比分类语法先进，因为前者“复杂得多，结构化程度也高得多”（1964b [1962]:917），而斯金纳行为主义失败了，因为它无法处理儿童头脑中“产生一组句子的极其复杂的机制”（1959:57）。事实上，复杂性与早期理论构建的一个流行词抽象性有关，波斯特尔比其他任何人都更重视这个流行词。但复杂性明显让位于简单性。现在，面对一个概念上简单得多的理论，乔姆斯基将复杂性与限制性联系起来，而限制性现在成了任何语言理论的主要优点。

27. Chomsky didn’t pull the virtues of complexity out of his hat at this point in the debate. It had been an important undercurrent in his argumentation for some time. Transformational grammar, for instance, was an advance over taxonomic grammar because it is “far more complex and highly structured” (1964b [1962]:917), and Skinnerian behaviorism was bankrupt because it failed to handle the “extremely complex mechanism for generating a set of sentences” in the child’s head (1959:57). Indeed, complexity was connected with a buzzword of early theory construction that Postal had taken more seriously than anyone else, abstractness. But complexity took a decided backseat to simplicity. Now, confronted with a conceptually much simpler theory, Chomsky stitched complexity to restrictiveness, which now became the primary virtue of any linguistic theory.

然而，奇怪的是，当乔姆斯基在“目标”会议论文中说复杂性的优点是“一个反复被提及的观点”时（1972b [1969]：126），他只给出了一个引文，即《方面》中的一节，其中相当间接地讨论了这一概念，只要求“抽象陈述和概括……丰富理论，并在语法描述模式上施加更多结构”（1965 [1964]：46）——这又引起了许多人对乔姆斯基的论点的不满。他的参考文献通常选择不当，甚至引用他自己的作品。据我所知，他并没有捏造这些参考文献（正如一些人指责的那样）；当他声称自己说过某事时，他确实说过，但他为支持这些主张而提供的参考文献并不总是尽可能清楚地推进他的论点，而且他经常可以引用更好的段落。

Oddly enough, though, when Chomsky says in the Goals conference paper that the merit of complexity is “a point that has been noted repeatedly” (1972b [1969]:126), he gives only one citation, a section of Aspects which discusses the notion rather obliquely, calling only for “abstract statements and generalizations … enriching the theory and imposing more structure on the schema for grammatical description” (1965 [1964]:46)—raising yet another frustration many people find with Chomsky’s arguments. His references are usually poorly chosen, even to his own work. He is not, so far as I can tell, guilty of fabrication in such references (as some have charged); when he claims to have said something, he has said it, but the references he offers as support for these claims do not always advance his case as clearly as they might, and often there are much better passages he could reference.

28.这一讨论有些误导。彼得斯-里奇的结果涉及所谓的弱生成能力，即规则系统指定符号串的能力。乔姆斯基在《方面》（1965 [1964]：60-62）等文章中指出，这不是语言理论的目标，语言理论应该关注强生成能力——将结构描述分配给符号串（例如，将短语圣诞树分配给英语句子）。此外，他在《方面》中指出，“[语法理论的]真正问题几乎总是通过在‘生成语法’概念中添加额外结构来限制可能假设的范围”（1965 [1964]：35），其中他也谈到了（除其他标准外）强生成能力。也就是说，乔姆斯基的限制性与彼得斯和里奇的工作没有任何直接的契合。尽管如此，研究结果和乔姆斯基对限制性的呼吁（这在《一些经验问题》中比在《方面》或其他任何地方都更为迫切）几乎总是被同时提及。例如，纽迈耶（1980a:176）说

28. This discussion is somewhat misleading. The Peters-Ritchie results concern what is known as weak generative capacity, the ability of a rule system to specify strings of symbols. Chomsky argues in Aspects (1965 [1964]:60–62) and elsewhere that this is not the goal of linguistic theory, which should concern itself with strong generative capacity—the assignment of structural descriptions to strings of symbols (for instance, assigning phrase structure trees to English sentences). Additionally, he argues in Aspects that “the real problem [of grammatical theory] is almost always to restrict the range of possible hypotheses by adding additional structure to the notion ‘generative grammar’” (1965 [1964]:35), where he is also talking of (among other criteria) strong generative capacity. That is, restrictiveness for Chomsky does not dovetail with Peters and Ritchie’s work in any direct way. Nonetheless, the results and Chomsky’s call for restrictiveness (which was far more urgent in “Some Empirical Issues” than in Aspects, or anywhere else) were almost always mentioned in the same breath. Newmeyer (1980a:176), for instance, says

Peters-Ritchie 的研究结果为 20 世纪 70 年代几乎所有重要的句法研究提供了无声的见证 [在解释主义框架中，‘重要’意味着‘重要’]。几乎没有一篇论文不诉诸于该理论的限制性增加，而这种限制性增加是该理论采纳其建议的结果。人们提出了一个又一个限制来限制语法的力量。

The Peters-Ritchie findings served as silent witness to almost all of the significant work in syntax in the 1970s [where significant means significant in the interpretivist framework]. There was hardly a paper written that did not appeal to the increased restrictiveness of the theory that followed as a consequence of the adoption of the proposals in its pages. Constraint after constraint was put forward to limit the power of the grammar.

纽迈耶在第二版（参见 1986a:189）中对这些言论做了一些缓和，因为他当时距离行动已经稍远，但仍然认为这些言论对证明有很大影响。

Newmeyer tempers these remarks somewhat in the second edition (cf. 1986a:189), written when he was a little further from the action, but still ascribes a great deal of influence to the proofs.

29.这里更容易引起混淆。特别是，包含约束的理论不一定就因为包含约束而成为更受约束的理论。如果一个理论允许任何可以想象的约束形式（如解释主义者指责生成主义者那样），它并不因此就成为一个更受约束的理论。事实上，它可能更加强大。最简单的方法是从 Perlmutter 的作品中看一看。他曾认为，没有可以想象的转换规则序列可以处理西班牙语中的代词性词缀，因此必须引入表面结构约束。通过添加约束，他扩展了模型的描述能力（参见他的尾声，1971：123-34，他在那里担心的就是这个问题）。尽管如此，在当时的文献中，约束的必要性几乎总是从限制或约束描述性的角度来讨论的。语法的力量。而且，最重要的是，生成语义学家早期的过滤和约束工作与后来的解释学家的工作非常相似，后者被无情地描绘成与生成语义学相反。

29. There is more potential for confusion here. In particular, it is not necessarily the case that a theory which includes constraints is a more constrained theory by virtue of that inclusion. If a theory allows any conceivable form of constraint (as the interpretivists charged of the generativists), it is not thereby a more restrictive theory. In fact, it might be much more powerful. The easiest way to see this is in terms of Perlmutter’s work. He had argued that no conceivable sequence of transformational rules could handle pronominal clitics in Spanish, and therefore a surface-structure constraint had to be brought in. By adding his constraint, he expanded the descriptive power of the model (see his epilogue, 1971:123–34, where he worries about just this issue). Nonetheless, the necessity for constraints is almost always discussed in the literature of the period in terms of restricting or constraining the descriptive powers of the grammar. And, most importantly, the early filters-and-constraints work of the generative semanticists was very much of a piece with the later work of the interpretivists, which was portrayed relentlessly as opposed to generative semantics.

30.另见 McCawley 的评论：“当 Lakoff 提出你需要全局规则时，这并不意味着每一条可以想象的全局规则都是可能的规则。你可以提出需要什么全局规则的问题，然后着手限制类别”（载 Parret，1974 [1972]：268）。

30. See also McCawley’s remarks: “When Lakoff proposed that you need global rules, that did not carry with it a proposal that every imaginable global rule is a possible rule. You can raise the question of what global rules are needed and set about restricting the class” (in Parret, 1974 [1972]:268).

31. Lakoff 的跨派生约束论文与他的全局规则论文非常相似，主要是收集表明需要此类约束的数据，并承认 Grinder、Postal 和 Perlmutter 的工作为跨派生约束指明了方向 (1973a [1970]:442)。也就是说，这一概念只是部分属于他。然而，Brame (1976:69) 却说跨派生约束仅归功于 Perlmutter 和 Hankamer，他引用了 Hankamer 1973 年对他的跨派生“无歧义条件”的讨论，这似乎是一项独立的发展，这太过分了。Hankamer 没有引用 Lakoff，他对该条件的研究可以追溯到 1971 年（Lakoff 也没有引用 Hankamer）。

31. Lakoff’s transderivational constraint paper, much like his global rules paper, is largely a collection of data that suggests the need for such constraints, and it acknowledges work by Grinder, Postal, and Perlmutter as pointing the way to transderivational constraints (1973a [1970]:442). That is, the concept is only partially his. Brame (1976:69), however, goes too far when he says that transderivational constraints are due only to Perlmutter and Hankamer, citing Hankamer’s 1973 discussion of his transderivational “No-Ambiguity Condition,” which seems to have been an independent development. Hankamer does not cite Lakoff, and his research into the condition dates to 1971 (nor does Lakoff cite Hankamer).

32.关于踪迹惯例的全局性的讨论，请参见 Bach (1977:135ff)、Postal and Pullum (1978) 以及 Lightfoot (1980:155ff)。

32. See Bach (1977:135ff), Postal and Pullum (1978), and Lightfoot (1980:155ff) for some discussion on the globality of the trace convention.

33.可以放心地称其为乔姆斯基的踪迹理论；它带有乔姆斯基不可磨灭的印记。但它的直接根源在于波斯特尔（1970）、贝克和布雷姆（1972）以及塞尔柯克（1972）的著作。莱科夫在发布全球规则的论文中首次注意到了“想要/想要”数据，并将其用作此类规则的依据之一（1970b）。另请参阅贝克和布雷姆（1972）、莱特福特（1​​980）、乔姆斯基和拉斯尼克（1977；1978）、波斯特尔和普勒姆（1978）、普勒姆和波斯特尔（1979）、麦考利（1982b [1973]：126n87）以了解“想要”辩论中的一些起伏和回避。

33. Trace theory can quite safely be called Chomsky’s; it bears his indelible stamp. But it has immediate roots in work by Postal (1970), by Baker and Brame (1972), and by Selkirk (1972). The want-to/wanna data was first noticed by Lakoff, in the paper that launched global rules, and used as one of the justifications for such rules (1970b). See also Baker and Brame (1972), Lightfoot (1980), Chomsky and Lasnik (1977; 1978), Postal and Pullum (1978), Pullum and Postal (1979), McCawley (1982b [1973]:126n87) for some ups and downs and sidesteps in the wanna debate.

34.然而，McCawley (1982b [1973]:29) 认为，乔姆斯基在必要时毫无顾忌地诉诸跨派生约束——尤其是，他在“评论”中的“类比规则”策略是对跨派生规则的诉求——但他避免使用“毒药”一词。他在 Chomsky 和 ​​Halle (1968) 中对全局规则的使用提出了类似的观点；参见 McCawley (1974c:73)。

34. McCawley (1982b [1973]:29), however, argues that Chomsky had no compunction about appealing to transderivational constraints as needed—in particular, that his “rules of analogy” ploy in “Remarks” was an appeal to a transderivational rule—but that he avoided the term like poison. He makes a similar point with respect to the use of global rules in Chomsky and Halle (1968); see McCawley (1974c:73).

35.实际上，在乔姆斯基那里，“语法性”这个术语通常是指（例如，1965[1964]:3，对于可接受性，参见，例如，1965[1964]:11）。

35. Actually, the term in Chomsky is usually grammaticalness (e.g., 1965 [1964]:3, for acceptability, see, e.g., 1965 [1964]:11).

36.尤其参见 Sadock，1969、1970、1971、1972、1974a、1985a；Davison，1970、1972、1973；Gordon and Lakoff，1988 [1971]；Robin Lakoff，1972a、1972b、1973a、1973b、1973c、1977；George Lakoff，1972a、1972b、1972c、1977b。

36. See especially Sadock, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972, 1974a, 1985a; Davison, 1970, 1972, 1973; Gordon and Lakoff, 1988 [1971]; Robin Lakoff, 1972a, 1972b, 1973a, 1973b, 1973c, 1977; George Lakoff, 1972a, 1972b, 1972c, 1977b.

37.这个词本身，作为语义学的陪衬，是由查尔斯·莫里斯（Charles Morris）创造的，他用它来概括“符号运作中发生的所有心理、生物和社会现象”（1938:108），而且，正如定义的范围所表明的那样，哲学家们通常用它来指代他们也不会处理的东西，比如布卢姆菲尔德的心理主义、乔姆斯基的表演，以及在程度上略有不同的布卢姆菲尔德和乔姆斯基所说的意义。因此，作为实用主义，语用学长期以来一直处于发展不良的状态。

37. The word itself, as a foil to semantics, is from Charles Morris, who used it to lump together “all the psychological, biological, and sociological phenomena which occur in the functioning of signs” (1938:108), and, as the scope of the definition indicates, philosophers generally used it to refer to something they weren’t going to deal with either, like Bloomfield’s mentalism, Chomsky’s performance, and, in slightly different degrees, to what both Bloomfield and Chomsky meant by meaning. So, pragmatics remained ill-developed for a long time, qua pragmatics.

意义的使用理论从维特根斯坦发展而来，演变为奥斯丁和塞尔的言语行为哲学，以及格赖斯的会话逻辑，在 70 年代，人们认为它在很大程度上涵盖了莫里斯所考虑的问题。因此，这个词开始指代语言学家（至少是其中的一些）将要研究的东西。然而，生成语义学家对界限有一种天生的恐惧，拒绝在语义学和语用学，当然还有句法之间建立原则性的分界线。他们在 70 年代研究的一个词（这个词是乔治亚·格林发明的）是pragmantax。参见肯普森 (1975)，他将语用学视为一种表现现象，Gazdar (1979) 将其视为能力现象，而 Green (1989) 则只是将其视为能力现象，他们对语用学如何融入语言学做出了一些有价值的解释。

The use theory of meaning which developed out of Wittgenstein into the speech-act philosophy of Austen and Searle, and the conversational logic of Grice, was seen in the seventies to embrace largely the sorts of issues that Morris had in mind. The word accordingly came to designate something that linguists (some of them at least) were going to study. Generative semanticists, however, had something of a constitutional fear of boundaries, and refused to set up a principled dividing line between semantics and pragmatics and, of course, syntax. One of the words (this one due to Georgia Green) for what they were studying in the seventies was pragmantax. See Kempson (1975), who treats pragmatics as a performance phenomenon, Gazdar (1979), who treats it as competence phenomenon, and Green (1989), who just treats it, for some worthy accounts of how pragmatics fits into linguistics.

38.需要提醒的是，邮政原则旨在解释以下事实：

38. To remind, Postal’s principle was meant to account for facts like:

(i) 对于杰夫来说，给自己刮胡子很困难。

(i) It is tough for Jeff to shave himself.

(ii) *杰夫自己刮胡子很困难。

(ii) *Jeff is tough for himself to shave.

39.有关支持这种从句法到语义的重新分析的相当详细的论证，请参见 Jackendoff (1972:120ff)。

39. See Jackendoff (1972:120ff) for a quite detailed argument supporting this syntactic-to-semantic reanalysis.

40.对于那些欣赏历史讽刺的人来说，以下引文是推荐的，因为它来自迈克尔·布雷姆 (Michael Brame)，他是乔姆斯基这一时期最坚定的支持者之一，也是莱考夫最讨厌的敌人之一，后来他发现乔姆斯基和莱考夫一样令人恼火：“随着踪迹理论的衰落，人们看到越来越多的牵强附会的手段被提出来，以适应真正遵循更现实方法的反例”(1979:13)。至少根据塔尔米·吉翁 (Talmy Givón) 的说法，生成语义学家也有可能受到类似的指责。他是少数几个指责生成语义学家转移数据的人之一，不过这暗示着他们反复无常而非不诚实：他嗤之以鼻地批评了这样一种理论，“形容词今天被宣布为动词（Ross and Lakoff，1967），明天又被宣布为名词（Ross，1969[a]）”（1979：14）。

40. For those who appreciate historical ironies, the following quotation is offered, since it comes from Michael Brame, one of Chomsky’s staunchest supporters in this period, and one of Lakoff’s nastiest enemies, who later found Chomsky as exasperating as Lakoff had: “as time runs out on trace theory, one sees ever more far-fetched devices proposed to accommodate counterexamples that genuinely follow from more realistic approaches” (1979:13). There was also a sense in which generative semanticists were open to a similar charge, at least according to Talmy Givón. He was one of the few people to indict the generative semanticists for data shifting, though with an implication of capriciousness rather than of dishonesty: he snorts about a theory “where adjectives were proclaimed to be verbs one day (Ross and Lakoff, 1967) and nouns the next (Ross, 1969[a])” (1979:14).

41.纵观这些论证，乔姆斯基说，这些论证“在我看来，相当有说服力”，并说“结构主义和莱科夫的语义学……实际上相当相似”(Chomsky, 1979 [1976]:154)。另见 Brame (1976:26n1)。

41. Surveying the arguments, Chomsky says they establish their case “quite persuasively, in my opinion” and says that “structuralism and Lakoff’s semantics … are in fact rather similar” (Chomsky, 1979 [1976]:154). See also Brame (1976:26n1).

42.有关这些问题的进一步讨论，请参阅 McCawley (1975)、Kuiper (1975)、Dougherty (1975)。

42. See McCawley (1975), Kuiper (1975), Dougherty (1975) for further discussion of the issues.

43.乔姆斯基最早对反馈的评论相当有力：“既没有经验证据，也没有任何已知论据支持任何关于环境反馈相对重要性的具体主张”（1959 [1957]：44）。但正如强调所表明的那样，他并没有排除反馈的普遍作用，乔姆斯基（1962b [1960]：530）明确地赋予了反馈这样的功能：“儿童可获得的其他数据（而不是退化的输入）可能在语言学习中发挥重要作用。因此，他可能有一组非句子（即语言社区的纠正）。他可能需要有关话语标记重复的信息。”然而，乔姆斯基在他的习得装置图表中添加的箭头与麦考利添加的箭头完全不同。乔姆斯基建议对“原始语言数据”概念进行改进，而不是对模型本身进行任何严肃的改进：

43. Chomsky’s earliest comments on feedback are fairly strong: “there is neither empirical evidence nor any known argument to support any SPECIFIC claim about the relative importance of feedback from the environment” (1959 [1957]:44). But, as the emphasis suggests, he didn’t rule out a general role, and Chomsky (1962b [1960]:530) explicitly grants it some such function: “Other data [than degenerate input] that the child has available to him may play an essential part in language learning. Thus he may have available a set of nonsentences (that is, corrections by the speech community). He may need information about repetition of utterance tokens.” The arrows Chomsky adds to the diagram of his acquisition device, though, are quite different from the one McCawley adds. Chomsky suggests a refinement simply of the notion “primary linguistic data,” not of the model itself in any serious way:

参见乔姆斯基（1988a:60）的最新言论，表明即便是这种细化也并没有给他带来多大兴趣：他主要关心的是获取装置的特性，而不是输入的特性。

See Chomsky (1988a:60) for a recent indication that even this sort of refinement doesn’t interest him very much: it is the character of the acquisition device, not of the input, that is his principal concern.

44.卡茨和贝弗只是顺便提到了罗斯和麦考利；波斯特尔只被引用过一次，作为罗斯两页短文的合著者；唯一一位出现的生成语义学家（与一篇社会语言学文章有关）是罗宾·莱考夫。然而，卡茨和贝弗确实做出了一个有趣的让步，即他们正在缩小所有的生成语义学家的范围。他们将生成语义学归功于一个人的工作，其中一节的标题是“案例研究：生成语义学，Lakoff 风格”（1976 [1974]：30），但他们认为他具有代表性，引用了 Ross 和 McCawley 的同情作品（p46），并且通常讨论 Lakoff 的作品，就好像它得到了生成语义学家的普遍认可一样。

44. Ross and McCawley are mentioned only in passing by Katz and Bever; Postal is cited only once, as co-author of a two-page squib with Ross; and the only other generative semanticist to make an appearance (in connection with a sociolinguistic article) is Robin Lakoff. Katz and Bever do, however, make one interesting concession that they are narrowing all of generative semantics to the work of one individual, with their title for one section, “A Case Study: Generative Semantics, Lakoff Style” (1976 [1974]:30), but they hold him to be representative, citing sympathetic work by Ross and McCawley (p46), and generally discussing Lakoff’s work as if it was universally endorsed by generative semanticists.

45.当然，这种立场助长了解释主义的论点，认为生成语义学是经验主义的倒退。Dougherty (1975:154) 的荒谬之处就在于此：“生成语义学是在哈里斯的转换分类系统内部发展起来的。”

45. Of course, such a position fed the interpretivist argument for generative semantics as an empiricist backslide. Witness Dougherty (1975:154) surpassing Ross’s absurdity here: “Generative semantics has been developed internal to Harris’s transformational taxonomic system.”

46.另见 Parret (1974 [1972]:250)。McCawley 在这里使用生成语法来描述句子集，严格意义上是句法结构意义上的，因此使用了引号。他现在持有一种更为广泛的生成语法概念，它描述的是“句子以外的事物”的集合；即“句子、意义、语境和风格/语域的复合体”(1988.1:6)。Lakoff 也几乎在同一时间表示“生成语义学家不做生成语法”(Parret, 1974 [1972]:152)，尽管他的拒绝更为彻底；例如，他不觉得有必要使用引号，并在整个采访中将生成语义和生成语法用作虚拟反义词。

46. See also Parret (1974 [1972]:250). McCawley here uses generative grammar in the strict Syntactic Structures sense of describing sets of sentences, hence the quotation marks. He now holds a more expansive notion of generative grammar, which describes sets of “something other than sentences”; namely, “complexes of sentence, meaning, context, and style/register” (1988.1:6). Lakoff also said “generative semanticists are not doing generative grammar” at about the same time (Parret, 1974 [1972]:152), though his rejection was far more sweeping; he does not, for instance, feel called to use quotation marks, and uses generative semantics and generative grammar as virtual antonyms throughout the interview.

47.类似的讨论，参见 Lyons (1970c:137–38)；Lehmann (1972:221–22)；Elgin (1973:134–35)；Wardaugh (1977:171–77)；Hayes、Orenstein 和 Gage (1977:102–5)，Simpson (1979:237–43)。在这些讨论中，格语法与生成语义学并存。

47. For similar discussions, see Lyons (1970c:137–38); Lehmann (1972:221–22); Elgin (1973:134–35); Wardaugh (1977:171–77); Hayes, Orenstein, and Gage (1977:102–5), Simpson (1979:237–43). In several of these discussions, case grammar is side by side with generative semantics.

48.如上文第 5 章所述，有些解释认为哈里斯的语法从根本上说是一种语义语法，尤其是根据以下陈述：“因此，几乎所有关于句子意义的内容都可以直接从成分 ψ、K 的意义和位置中获得。因此，有了这个理论……就不需要额外的语义理论了”(Harris, 1968:211；ψ 表示基础转换，K 表示核心)。但哈里斯在宾夕法尼亚大学从事转换和话语分析项目的合作者蒙茨和在相关论证中提到的普洛茨 (1972:1-52) 显然是哈里斯的支持者，他们试图将他的工作搭上当时如火如荼的生成语义学潮流。

48. There are, as in chapter 5 above, some interpretations under which Harris’s grammar is a fundamentally semantic one, especially in light of statements like: “Almost everything that there is to say about the meaning of a sentence can therefore be obtained directly from the meaning and the positions of the components ψ, K. Hence, given this theory … there is little need for an additional semantic theory” (Harris, 1968:211; ψ designates base transformations, K designates kernels). But Muntz, a collaborator with Harris at the University of Pennsylvania on the Transformation and Discourse Analysis Project there, and Plötz (1972:1–52), in a related argument, are clearly Harris supporters attempting to hitch his work to the generative semantics bandwagon, which was in full gallop at the time.

49.有关心理学会议上生成语义学家的例子，请参阅 Ross, 1974b；McCawley, 1974b。有关哲学会议上生成语义学家的例子，请参阅 Lakoff, 1972b, 1973d, 1975；McCawley, 1972, 1973b。

49. For examples of generative semanticists at psychology conferences, see Ross, 1974b; McCawley, 1974b. For examples at philosophy conferences, see Lakoff, 1972b, 1973d, 1975; McCawley, 1972, 1973b.

第八章

Chapter 8

1.罗宾·莱考夫 (Robin Lakoff) 在很大程度上将生成主义风格及其影响归因于时代精神，“当时鼓励对生活方式和个性进行实验”(1989:977)。另见 1992 年重印的 Zwicky 等人 (1971) 书中 Darnell 的引言。

1. In large part, Robin Lakoff ascribes the generativist style and its impact to the temper of the times, “when experimentation with lifestyle and personality was encouraged” (1989:977). See also Darnell’s Introduction in the 1992 reprint of Zwicky and others (1971).

2.然而，必须提出几个重要的警告。首先，有许多语言学家相信生成语义学——例如，他们发表了彻头彻尾的生成语义学论文，如“论句法和语义学之间的所谓界限”（Newmeyer，1970）和“论原子谓词CAUSE的句法和语义学”（Dowty，1972）——但他们的作品只显示出这种风格的微弱痕迹。其次，有些语言学家只在非常有限的写作子集中使用这种风格。例如，波斯特尔倾向于以非常正式的、几乎是乔姆斯基风格的风格写作，但经常将另类的例句与这种散文并列，他的出版物比他的地下出版物带有更严肃的语气。第三，一些解释语义学家，如杰肯多夫和阿克马吉安，也使用了这种风格的元素——比纽梅尔或道蒂使用的元素要多得多。最重要的是，在芝加哥语言学会的各种会议论文集中可以找到大量展示这种风格的著作；也就是说，其主要目的之一是口头传达时要有效。事实上，本章很容易被命名为“CLS 精神”。

2. It is important, however, to make several important caveats. First, there were many linguists who bought into generative semantics—who, for instance, published dyed-in-the-wool generative semantics papers like “On the Alleged Boundary between Syntax and Semantics” (Newmeyer, 1970), and “On the Syntax and Semantics of the Atomic Predicate CAUSE” (Dowty, 1972)—but whose work shows only faint traces of this style. Second, there are linguists who employed this style only in very restricted subsets of their writing. Postal, for instance, tended to write in a very formal, almost Chomskyan style, but frequently juxtaposed offbeat sample sentences to this prose, and his publications carried a much more serious tone than his samizdat papers. Third, some interpretive semanticists, like Jackendoff and Akmajian, also used elements of this style—considerably more elements, for instance, than Newmeyer or Dowty. And, most importantly, a great deal of work which showcases this style is to be found in the various proceedings of the Chicago Linguistic Society; that is, one of its principal aims is to be effective when delivered orally. Indeed, this chapter might easily have been entitled “The CLS Ethos.”

但是，生成语义学与 CLS 的联系非常紧密。该学会是生成语义学的组织中心，在其会议记录中发表了该运动至少一半的论文，充当了最新思想的交换会，并举办了最好的聚会。在最近较为沉稳的时代，CLS 的热情有所减弱，但幅度不大。例如， 《CLS 最佳作品》（Schiller 等人，1988 年）前言的年代安排是用“尼克松时代”和“约翰逊担任总统时”来表示的。Quang Phuc Dong 的一篇论文被收录其中，“以捕捉 CLS 的风格”，因为它涉及“被更正直的语言学家忽视的习语”。前言的结尾是“最高法院最近重申了我们自由发言的权利。在 CLS，你随时可以这样做！”

But the identification of generative semantics with the CLS was an extremely close one. The society was the organizational center of generative semantics, publishing at least half the movement’s papers in its proceedings, serving as a swap meet for the latest ideas, and throwing the best parties. The CLS exuberance has abated somewhat in more recent, more staid times, but not much. The dating scheme of the preface to The Best of CLS (Schiller and others, 1988), for instance, is given in terms of “the Nixon years” and “back when Johnson was president.” A Quang Phuc Dong paper is included “to capture the flavor of CLS” because it deals “with idioms which were ignored by more straightlaced linguists.” And the preface ends with “The Supreme Court recently re-affirmed our right to speak freely. At CLS, you can always do so!”

3.对于那些不理解这一典故的读者来说：当时曾有一个精心编造的、怪异的谣言，这是当时偏执和神秘主义的典型表现，谣言说保罗·麦卡特尼已经死亡，心怀恶意的金钱贩子极力掩盖这一事实，但真正的披头士成员正试图通过神秘的歌词、象征性的专辑封面等形式，将真相告知忠实的粉丝，最奇怪的是，他们通过编码信息，只有倒放他们唱片的某些部分才能辨别这些信息。

3. For readers to whom this allusion is obscure: there was an elaborate and bizarre rumor, characteristic of the paranoia and mysticism of the period, that Paul McCartney was dead, that there had been a massive cover-up of this by evil-minded money-mongerers, but that the genuine remaining Beatles were trying to get the truth to the faithful in the form of cryptic lyrics, symbolic album covers, and, strangest of all, by encoding messages that could only be discerned by playing certain sections of their records backwards.

4.例如，维德·梅塔 (Ved Mehta) 非常担心乔姆斯基的解释能力太过枯燥，他曾问过他，为什么一个对语言技术特征有如此深刻理解的人，写作能力却如此糟糕 (1971:192)，他认为这种特征是如此明显，以至于他将包含采访的文章命名为“约翰很容易取悦”。后来，当他将这篇文章和他在《纽约客》上发表的其他一些文章汇编成书时，他仍然保留了对这个书名的喜爱（这本书就是《约翰很容易取悦》）。

4. Ved Mehta, for instance, was concerned enough about Chomsky’s expository dullness to ask him how it was that someone with such a penetrating understanding of the technical features of language could write so poorly (1971:192), and thought the trait so definitive that he entitled the article containing the interview, “John Is Easy to Please.” When he later collected the article and some of his other New Yorker pieces into a book, he retained his pleasure with the title (the book is John Is Easy to Please).

5.为了避免本段被括号内的引用所拖累，我把它们都留在这里：罗斯回忆说，Flip是由波斯特尔在他六十年代早期在麻省理工学院上课时创造的，出现在莱科夫的论文中； Slifting（罗斯，1973a）；Sluicing（罗斯，1970a[1967]：252）；Stuffing（罗斯，1972a：162）；Irving（摩根女士，引自霍恩，1970：325）；Ludwig（纽鲍尔，1970：403）；Richard（罗杰斯，1971）；服装代词删除（格林德，1970：300）；委婉生殖器删除（引自Borkin，1984[1974]：105-6）。

5. To keep this paragraph from getting too bogged down by parenthetical references, I’ve saved them all for here: Flip, Ross recalls, was coined by Postal in his early sixties classes at MIT, showing up in print in Lakoff’s thesis; Slifting (Ross, 1973a); Sluicing (Ross, 1970a [1967] :252); Stuffing (Ross, 1972a:162); Irving (Morgan, ms., cited in Horn, 1970:325); Ludwig (Neubauer, 1970:403); Richard (Rogers, 1971); Apparel Pronoun Deletion (Grinder, 1970:300); Euphemistic Genital Deletion (cited in Borkin, 1984 [1974]:105–6).

Stockwell (1977:131n2) 批评生成主义者选择这样的规则名称，“它们既不便于记忆，含义也不透明”，但奇怪的是，在他指责的三个名称中—— Pied-Piping、Tough -movement 和Sluicing ——只有最后一个特别麻烦。Pied-Piping非常合适且便于记忆，因为它描述了在运动分析中一个词可以跟在另一个词后面的情况，而Tough - movement则是一个非常常见的词，受其标记的过程的影响。参见 Robin Lakoff 对 Stockwell (1989:975n11) 的部分回应，以及 Postal 对乔姆斯基主义者的讽刺性建议：“当然，为了显得严肃，人们应该避免使用……像‘Rumplestiltskin’或‘Debby Does Dallas’这样的名字。选择像‘收缩决定条件’或‘可恢复性’这样的名字”(1988b:131)。

Stockwell (1977:131n2) criticizes the generativists for choosing such rule names, “which are neither mnemonic nor transparent in their meaning” but, curiously, of the three names he indicts—Pied-Piping, Tough-movement, and Sluicing—only the last is especially troublesome. Pied-Piping is very appropriate and mnemonic, since it describes the situation where one word can follow after another in movement analyses, and Tough-movement names a very common word subject to the processes it labels. See Robin Lakoff’s partial response to Stockwell (1989:975n11), and Postal’s backhanded advice to would-be Chomskyans: “To appear serious, of course, one should avoid … names like ‘Rumplestiltskin’ or ‘Debby Does Dallas’. Select something like ‘The Contraction Determination Condition’ or ‘Recoverability’” (1988b:131).

6.论坛的作用，以及因此而产生的听众的作用，是生成主义精神中一个被低估的因素。例如，纽梅尔对生成语义学风格的讨论主要是负面的，他列举了三个标题、三个规则名称、三个例句和三个散文摘录，作为他对“在生成语义学框架中如此多的写作中普遍存在的异想天开的表达风格”的评论的证据（1980a:171；1986a:136）；除四个例子外，其余所有例子都来自 CLS 出版物。这个比例可能并非不具代表性；撇开难以清楚地识别所有生成语义学论文的困难，大多数可能出现在 CLS 卷中，尽管可能没有三分之二那么多。纽梅尔准确地将他的例子所反映的风格归因于“年轻的热情（1970 年生成语义学家的平均年龄远低于 30 岁）和[到]喧闹的个性（1986a:137），但他未能评论地点的贡献。

6. The role of forum, and consequently of audience, is an underappreciated factor in the generativist ethos. Newmeyer’s largely negative discussion of the generative semantics style, for instance, lists three titles, three rule names, three sample sentences, and three prose extracts as evidence for his remarks on “the whimsical style of presentation that pervaded so much written in [the generative semantics] framework” (1980a:171; 1986a:136); all but four examples come from CLS publications. This ratio is perhaps not unrepresentative; putting aside the difficulty of clearly identifying all the generative semantics papers, the majority likely appeared in CLS volumes, though probably not as many as two-thirds. Newmeyer accurately attributes the style reflected in his examples to “youthful enthusiasm (the average age of generative semanticists in 1970 was well below 30) and [to] the rambunctious personalities of several prominent generative semanticists” (1986a:137), but he fails to comment on the contribution of venue.

CLS 聚会主要是口头活动，有效的口头技巧在纸上并不总是同样有效。罗斯和莱考夫以充满活力的弗洛伊德演讲树立了标准，这些演讲吸引了众多生成主义者，将智慧和闪光提升到了修辞货币市场的顶端。但值得注意的是，弗洛伊德的演讲——尽管其中的摘要和数据表在流传——从未付印。更重要的是，CLS 集会主要是信徒的聚会。用 Wayne Booth 的话来说，它的演讲主要针对一个受祝福的社区，其风格强化了团体精神：“你总能通过它的标题、轻松的风格、有趣的例子来辨别 GS 论文。你知道谁属于这里，谁是你的同胞。这是无情世界中的舒适之所”（R. Lakoff，1989：977）。

The CLS gatherings were primarily oral events, and effective oral techniques do not always work equally well on paper. Ross and Lakoff had set the standard with the energetic Floyd presentations that had recruited so many generativists, raising wit and flash to the top of the rhetorical currency market. But it is noteworthy that the Floyd shows—though epitomes and data-sheets from them were in circulation—never made it to press. More importantly, the CLS assemblies were largely gatherings of the faithful. In Wayne Booth’s terms, its presentations were principally directed at a community of the blessed, and the style reinforced the group ethos: “You could always tell a GS paper: by its title, its breezy style, its funny examples. You knew who belonged, who your people were. It was cozy comfort in a heartless world” (R. Lakoff, 1989:977).

7.即使是通常较为宽容的 CLS 编辑（其中 Lakoff 是他们的最爱），也不得不对这一句发表评论，引用了史努比的评论：“实际上，在你击败某人之后，你真的不应该说‘Nyahh，Nyahh，Nyahh！’”（Lakoff，1973b：290）。这并不是 Lakoff 的攻击性没有得到特别好的掩饰的唯一例子。他的例句也偶尔会抨击另一方，例如在并列句中并列词汇学家和妓女（1971c：333），并提供了这句激昂的话语，“乔姆斯基是语言学界的戴高乐”（1973d：235）。

7. Even the generally forgiving editors of CLS, among whom Lakoff is a favorite, felt compelled to add an editorial comment on this one, quoting Snoopy’s comment: “Actually, after you ace someone, you really shouldn’t say ‘Nyahh, Nyahh, Nyahh!’” (Lakoff, 1973b:290). This was not the only example where Lakoff’s aggressiveness was not especially well concealed. His sample sentences also took occasional potshots at the other side, such as juxtaposing lexicalists and whores in parallel sentences (1971c:333), and offering up this gem of agonism, “Chomsky is the DeGaulle of linguistics” (1973d:235).

8.他后来出版了一些书籍，在这些书籍中，他的形式语言学观点和政治观点的融合更加明显（例如，1979 [1976]；1986；1988a），讽刺的是，他因此受到了一些前生成主义者的批评。

8. He has subsequently published books in which the blending of his formal linguistics and his politics is considerably more overt (e.g., 1979 [1976]; 1986; 1988a), and ironically, been taken to task for it by some former generativists.

9.乔姆斯基在 1984 年的一次学术讨论会上发表的一些评论与拉科夫的言论有有趣的相似之处——当然，乔姆斯基的结论非常不同：“也许有一天实验会很有用，但是现在如果你坐下来思考几分钟，你就会收到大量你无法解释的相关数据”（Chomsky, 1984:44）。

9. There is a curious parallel to Lakoff’s remarks here in some later comments by Chomsky, at a 1984 colloquium—though, of course, Chomsky’s conclusions are very different: “Maybe someday experiments will be useful, but right now if you sit and think for a few minutes, you’re just flooded with relevant data that you can’t explain” (Chomsky, 1984:44).

10.这种对有问题的数据的执着标志着许多生成语义学家对纽迈耶对这一运动的处理方式的另一个不满。他将这种执着称为“数据崇拜”，并严厉批评生成语义学家的“虚无主义观点”（1980a:168；1986a:133）。拉科夫称这种现象为“数据热爱”和“诚实”，并在完成婚姻隐喻的同时，赞扬生成语义学家“忠于事实”。有关这一论点，请参阅麦考利（1980a:917-19）——他使用反向隐喻，将纽迈耶的态度与“传统的基督教对性的态度”进行了比较：收集数据的乐趣只有在神圣的理论建构范围内才是正当的，并且不能过度；娱乐性数据收集是令人厌恶的”——以及 Newmeyer (1980b:932–34) 的回应。Robin Lakoff (1989) 继续讨论。

10. This preoccupation with problematic data marks another point of disaffection that many generative semanticists have with Newmeyer’s treatment of the movement. He terms the preoccupation “data fetishism,” and castigates generative semanticists for their “nihilistic outlook” (1980a:168; 1986a:133). Lakoff calls the phenomenon “data love” and “honesty,” and, completing the connubial metaphor, celebrates generative semanticists for their “fidelity to the facts.” See McCawley (1980a:917–19) for an argument to this effect—where, using the inverse metaphor, he compares Newmeyer’s attitude to “the traditional Christian attitude towards sex: the pleasure of gathering data is proper only within the confines of holy theory construction and when not carried to excess; recreational data-gathering is an abomination”—and Newmeyer (1980b:932–34) for his response. Robin Lakoff (1989) continues the discussion.

11.本段所有引文均来自 Borkin 等人 (1968) 的序言​​。第一个引文是对 Burt 观点的解释，可能由 Borkin 所作。其余引文则直接引自 Burt。

11. All quotations in this paragraph are from the preface to Borkin and others (1968). The first quotation is a paraphrase of Burt’s position, presumably by Borkin. The others are quotations directly from Burt.

12. IULC 是一个非常重要的油印分发机构，它分发了辩论双方的许多开创性的论文和工作文件，并且继续发挥着类似的作用。

12. The IULC was a mimeograph distribution house of great importance, which circulated many groundbreaking theses and working papers, on both sides of the debate, and continues to serve a similar purpose.

13.在这种欢快的、充满争议的修辞中，莱考夫提出了明显的反文化诉求、一些幽默，以及一个明确的主题：生成语义学程序是救赎之路，部分原因是它包含了老派无法忍受的那种坚定的怀疑主义，部分原因是它比浅显的语言学更有意义（“我们对句子含义的了解远多于对其表面结构的了解”）。更有趣的是，从讽刺的序言到紧迫的前言，所有这些都表明了这样一种态度：真正的科学需要接受模型的人工性，数据的混乱。序言要求“面对科学的现实”。序言呼吁语言学学生要像“任何物理科学学生”一样负责任，并认识到虚假信息的真实性。

13.
